strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Welcome to the weekend! Here are some ideas to make it a fun one: 

  • Polar lights: From north to south, NWA will get a little brighter this weekend with the start of Lights of the Ozarks at the Fayetteville Square tonight at 6p and the Lighting of the Square in Bentonville Saturday at 6p. 
  • Goals: Razorbacks Soccer hosts Ohio State for the second round of the NCAA Tournament tonight at 6:30p. 
  • Shop til you drop: Explore fabulous merchants during the NWA Boutique Show at the Rogers Convention Center today from 11a-4:30p and 9a-6p tomorrow. Don’t forget the fun Girls Night Out tonight! 
  • Cyclocross: Join ALL Cross CX at the Railyard in Rogers this Saturday, Nov 19 for cyclocross races that everyone can join. Register HERE. 
  • Mixer: Enjoy a locally curated art exhibit at the grand opening of MIXD Gallery in Rogers this Saturday, Nov 19 from 12-4p. 
  • Thanks: TheatreSquared is hosting a staged reading of Larissa Fasthorse’s show, “The Thanksgiving Play” this Sunday, Nov 20 at 5p. 

Stay warm out there! We’ll see you Monday.
